gaga.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: an insulting word used to describe someone who is confused because they are old
gaga.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Sid keeps forgetting my name. I think he’s going a bit gaga.
gaga.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: having a strong but often temporary feeling of love for someone
gaga.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: I can’t imagine why Susan is so gaga about him.
